column3: Concept ACK. Imo these are all fixes for 0.14.\n\nWill review in detail.
I think it makes sense to log "already connected" here, otherwise it looks like the attempt fell into a black hole.

This isn't an issue for 0.14 because it's always been this way, but I really don't like that we pass this out through our signals before adding it locally.\n\nSo, no objection to this change, but I'd like to clean it up some post-0.14.
OK, moved the signals to the end as well.
